stories.title: Crypto community slams ‘disastrous’ new amendment to big infrastructure bill

stories.text:
Many of us here, myself included, often examine the many shortcomings of our species and the projected consequences.

I’m hoping to tap into some optimism here and ask about what positive visions we each have for the future.

What should the goal be? Can it possibly be achieved? Where do you hope we have progressed to by 3021?
stories.title: Ask HN: The ideal direction of humankind in the next millennium?
One Man Changed the High Jump Forever – The Olympics on the Record
Did WFH Hurt the Video Game Industry?
Planning for Servers in 2022 and Beyond
Learning to Live in Steven Weinberg’s Pointless Universe
Technology Trends That Define the Digital Age
What Do You Do with a Billion Grams of Surplus Weed?
Picture on the cover of the book “Introduction to Analytic Number Theory”

stories.text:
What works of fiction do you know that delve deep into advanced scientific notions? 
For example, I can think of books by Neal Stephenson (especially Anathem which delves into the intricacies of some (far-fetched) quantum theories), or Blindsight by Peter Watts.
stories.title: Ask HN: Works of fiction delving into advanced scientific notions?
